item.title: EP 810 - It Sings In The Darkness, It Hungers For Your Flesh!
item.itunes:title: It Sings In The Darkness, It Hungers For Your Flesh!
item.description:
Today we steal a haunted tree from a haunted elementary school, and then we come face to face with the singing spider from the Paris catacombs!

Fan Art Friday by TVP VT U

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

EP 49 - Crazy Cryptid Week: The Jba Fofi and The Sabinche Tomatovic Tape (Giant Spider episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-49-crazy-cryptid-week-the-jba-fofi-and-the-sabinche-tomatovic-tape

EP 35 - Fortress Of Solitude (Paris Catacombs episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-35-fortress-of-solitude

EP 129 - The Christmas Special! (Basque Giant episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-129-the-christmas-special

EP 188 - Is The Smithsonian Destroying Giant Skeletons?
https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-188-is-the-smithsonian-destroying-giant-skeletons

Haunted Places: The National Directory: Ghostly Abodes, Sacred Sites, UFO Landings and Other Supernatural Locations

https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001R11CN0/ref=dbs_a_def_rwt_hsch_vapi_tkin_p1_i4

HAUNTING THE ELEMENTARY

http://whatwasthen.blogspot.com/2011/08/haunted-elementary.html

Camacho Films: The Metz School Haunting

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4OGCqkqs-g&ab_channel=AustinParks%26Recreation

Haunted Austin: Metz Elementary

https://www.austinmonthly.com/haunted-austin-metz-elementary/

Metz Elementary School - Real Haunted Place

https://www.texashauntedhouses.com/real-haunt/metz-elementary-school.html

Visiting Metz alleviates pupils ghostly fears (paywall)

https://statesman.newsbank.com/doc/news/0EAD902FFB08493D?

Monster Of Issoir

https://aadl.org/node/123594

Singing Spiders of Paris

https://obscurban-legend.fandom.com/wiki/Singing_Spiders_of_Paris

Hunting Arachne Gigans – Singing Spiders of Paris

https://armaitus.wordpress.com/2013/01/24/hunting-arachne-gigans-singing-spiders-of-paris/

The Giant of Tombe Issoire

https://www.blipfoto.com/entry/486321

AN EIGHT-LEGGED SIREN FROM FRANCE - A SINGING GIANT SPIDER FROM THE CATACOMBS OF ISSOIRE

http://karlshuker.blogspot.com/2014/08/an-eight-legged-siren-from-france.html

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Simple

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Youtube Champ Stewart Meatball
